title: ConvertXtoDVD v5.1.0.6 [BETA] + Patch.rar
description:
Includes the VSO ConvertXtoDVD v5.1.0.6 BETA installation package, a patch and a text file 

containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch. No serial number required. Done! Enjoy!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Convert videos to DVD and watch on any DVD player. Automatically burn to DVD after 

conversion. Excellent and fast converter.

Convert AVI, MKV, MOV, Divx, WMV, MTS/M2TS, MPG, MP4 and more to DVD.

Create menus & chapters, cut videos, total customization with live preview.


Edit your project with the various settings and features listed below:
  -Create menus with videos and music
  -Preview window / Integrated video player for live preview
  -Cut unwanted parts of the video
  -Add chapters - automatic or custom
  -Many subtitles formats supported, convert soft or hard-coded
  -Convert NTSC to PAL and vice-versa
  -Merge function - like for CD1 + CD2
  -Rotate video, modify brightness and contrast settings
  -Compatible with any disks
  -ISO output available
  -NTSC + PAL region formats
  -16:9 widescreen + 4:3 fullscreen
  -Burn multiple copies
  -VSO burning engine included
  -Various SD resolutions available
  -Custom output size
  -Burn to DVD/USB key or store on PC

Additional/Advanced features:
  -2 pass encoding for enhanced quality
  -Hardware decoding for faster conversion
  -Video/Audio/Subtitle synchronisation
  -Various audio output formats
  -Image resize filters (lanczos, linear, cubic, etc.)
  -Multiple encoding profiles
  -Option to shutdown computer when finished
  -Multi-core processor optimized
  -Audio amplifier
  -Padding and cropping
  -De-interlacing
  -Batch converter
  -Multiple conversions processed simultaneously
  -Quality advisor

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY UPGRADE?

- 0007134: [Bug] preview and conversion problem with specific file (cedric) - resolved.
- 0006827: [Bug] 5.0.0.64 regression from 5.0.0.51: mpeg2 files with pulldown no longer   

converted with pulldown (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007189: [Bug] av changing language (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007257: [Bug] when switching languages get "please enter a number" (cedric) - resolved.
- 0006429: [Bug] menu text if too large reduce and crop do not work (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007253: [Information] how to display registered version in about section (cedric) -   

resolved.
- 0007256: [Bug] here is no Ok/Cancel Bottom in subtitle style editor (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007282: [Information] formating of about window (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007155: [Bug] 5.0.0.78 messed up chapter points when cutting merged files (cedric) -   

resolved.
- 0007285: [Bug] No default background audio in menus (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007281: [Bug] regression: no support for WMV PRO (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007249: [Bug] save chapter list does not work (cedric) - resolved.
